definition: An adjective used to describe a person or thing that has reached a high level of skill, knowledge, or progress in a particular field or activity. It is commonly used to refer to someone who is advanced or proficient in a specific subject or discipline.

examples.german: Er ist in seinem Deutschkurs fortgeschritten.
examples.english: He is advanced in his German course.

examples.german: Sie hat fortgeschrittene Kenntnisse in der Programmierung.
examples.english: She has advanced knowledge in programming.
That is an advanced math problem.

examples.german: Die fortgeschrittenen Schüler können schwierigere Aufgaben lösen.
examples.english: The advanced students can solve more difficult tasks.

examples.german: Er hat ein fortgeschrittenes Verständnis für die Physik.
examples.english: He has an advanced understanding of physics.
